title: Trump's crypto project appears to have bought Ether after tariff meltdown
summary: World Liberty Financial, a decentralized finance project linked to Trump’s family, added approximately $55 million worth of Ether (ETH) after crypto markets crashed following Trump’s brief imposition of tariffs on Mexico and Canada
